context_of_use: This use case allows systems analysts and nurses to document clinical encounters effectively.
stakeholders_and_interests: systems analyst: Ensure accurate data for analytics
description: Capture appointment times and patient notes to document care and support analytics.
triggering_event: A clinical encounter occurs requiring documentation.
preconditions: The systems analyst and nurse are logged into the hospital management system.
postconditions: Appointment times and patient notes are recorded in the system.
assumptions: The hospital management system has the capability to record appointment times and patient notes.
The included use case 'manage clinical data collection' is implemented.
requirements_met: The system shall allow appointment times to be recorded.
The system shall allow patient notes to be recorded.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on data retention policies for recorded notes.
main_flow: 1. systems analyst records appointment start and end times → system stores appointment duration data.
2. nurse records patient notes → system stores patient care information.
3. system confirms data has been successfully recorded.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the appointment times cannot be recorded, the system prompts the user to retry or cancel the action.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system fails to store appointment times, an error message is displayed and the user is notified.
